contraindications.note: Generally well tolerated. No major contraindications.

pcn_allergy.note: Safe with PCN allergy (no cross-reactivity). Excellent alternative for uncomplicated cystitis.

pregnancy_notes: Safe in pregnancy. Commonly used for uncomplicated UTI in pregnant women.

CrCl_<80.note: Reduced efficacy with lower CrCl. Consider alternative.

cystitis.note: SINGLE-DOSE therapy for uncomplicated cystitis in women. Mix packet with water and drink immediately.

uti_uncomplicated.note: For uncomplicated lower UTI only. DO NOT USE for pyelonephritis.

pediatric.note: NOT approved for children <12 years. If ≥12 years: adult dose (3 g × 1).

spectrum.note: URINARY CONCENTRATION ONLY - inadequate tissue levels for pyelonephritis/systemic infections. Active against ESBL-producing E. coli.

notes: ⚠️ DO NOT USE FOR PYELONEPHRITIS (inadequate tissue levels)
Alternative to nitrofurantoin and TMP/SMX for uncomplicated cystitis
Excellent for multidrug-resistant UTI (ESBL E. coli)
Safe with PCN, sulfa, fluoroquinolone allergies
Patient convenience: Single dose (vs 5-7 day courses)
Mix packet with 3-4 oz (90-120 mL) cold water and drink immediately
Take on empty stomach (1 hour before or 2 hours after meals) for best absorption
Cure rates slightly lower than 5-7 day courses (85% vs 90-95%)
evidence: IDSA Uncomplicated UTI Guidelines 2019 - alternative for cystitis
Cochrane Review: Fosfomycin for uncomplicated UTI
Effective against ESBL E. coli (95% susceptibility)
